data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Roza, André Silva, Quintino, Hingrid Yara Souza, Mermudes, José Ricardo Miras, Silveira, Luiz Felipe Lima Da (2017): Akamboja gen. nov., a new genus of railroad-worm beetle endemic to the Atlantic Rainforest, with five new species (Coleoptera: Phengodidae, Mastinocerinae). Zootaxa 4306 (4): 501-523, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4306.4.3|28 occurrences
